content:
I am getting the following error in the IG build

error   The link 'ASN1ToHL7Codes.html' for "currently defined ASN1 Codes" cannot be resolved

But I click on the link being referred to and it works.
Same with this one

The link 'PhdBITsEnumerationObservation.html' for "here" cannot be resolved
Is the link pointing to something defined in the IG?

Is the link pointing to something defined in the IG?

I think it may be case-spelling. Windows is not case sensitive to file names so the links work.
many link errors are case errors. check that first.

many link errors are case errors. check that first.

Harder to find when working on Windows ... the links WORK!
same in OSX, also renaming files using git by only changing the case won't change the case -i.e., that won;t trigger a new commit. you have to do that explicitly.
